page.title: 16Employment in Wootton
page.content: Most residents work in Oxford or Abingdon. But there is a small industrial estate which is occupied by a firm that picks up cars from{Cowley and delivers them all over the country. There can be as many as 300 cars on the site, which creates a lot of traffic. A large mail order warehouse called JLB and a huge 'Wekankarryit' haulage firm add to the traffic. The car carrier firm would like to extend its hours of working to 24 hours. At present it is closed from 8pm to 7am. There are a few shops in Wootton including a chemist, a supermarket and a hairdresser. However a {free bus }service to the Tesco hypermarket has taken trade away from the local supermarket.
